name: Nachiket More
summary: I am a graduate from Portland State University with a Master's in Computer Science. I have gained industry experience across multiple companies, working on frontend and backend systems. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge in Software Engineering to build efficient and user-friendly software. Feel free to reach out if my skills align with your company's needs!

publications.title: Comparative Study Of Flight Delay Prediction Using Back Propagation And Radial Basis Function
publications.publisher: International Research Journal of Engineering and Technology (IRJET)

projects.project_title: Web App for Quick and Easy Recipes
info: Developed a full-stack web app using React (frontend) and Django (backend) and DynamoDB for recipe storage.
Deployed frontend on AWS S3 and backend on Elastic Beanstalk, with CI/CD pipelines via AWS CodePipeline.
Python web app for movie analysis showcasing details and sentiment analysis of reviews.
Used TMDB API for movie details and Google's API for sentiment analysis.
Implemented Docker from Google Cloud for deployment.

projects.project_title: AeroGraph - Full Stack Flight Data Visualization Application
info: React and Node.js based front-end app to visualize flight data with MongoDB backend.
Used react-google-charts and react-simple-maps libraries for data representation.
MERN stack web app with an Express Node.js backend and MongoDB for data storage.
Containerized the app with Docker and FastAPI for microservices architecture with integrated Auth0 for MFA.
